entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
